This is a set of four instructional R notebooks, as part of the PSA Training Series for Spring 2020. You can find the links to the rendered HTML pages above to read along, or return to the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/precision-sustainable-ag/database-querying-R){target="_blank"} to clone and follow along interactively in R on your computer. There are also links to video walkthroughs for each notebook.
